taskbody.prereq:
Before you begin, if you cannot see the Fraction Creator pane and the Fraction Converter pane, you have ticked Hide Fraction Section. Select
Options Hide Fraction Section . The tick next to Hide Fraction Section disappears, and the Fraction Converter pane and Fraction Creator pane appear.
